name: BlockIO Cloud Wallet Adapter
description: Allows your LeefCoin and Altcoin Wallets WordPress plugin to interface with your block.io cloud wallet account.

name: CoinPayments Adapter
description: Allows your LeefCoin and Altcoin Wallets WordPress plugin to interface with your CoinPayments.net cloud wallet account.

name: Fiat Coin Adapter
description: With this coin adapter for fiat currencies, an admin can manually insert offline fiat transactions on behalf of users.

name: Full Node Multi Coin Adapter
description: Allows the LeefCoin and Altcoin Wallets WordPress plugin to connect to a large number of LeefCoin-like full node wallets via their JSON RPC API.

name: Monero Coin Adapter
description: Connect to a Monero wallet, or to any other wallet that is a fork of CryptoNote.

name: TurtleCoin Adapter
description: Connect to a TurtleCoin wallet, or to any other wallet that is a fork of TurtleCoin.
